page.title: 09Ashton Gardens
page.content: There are many activities in Ashton Gardens,two bowling greens,a children's playground with swings and roundabouts.There are areas for football,tennis,and putting. In the Gardens are an attractive duck pond and aviary. There are many kinds of trees and flowers. The gardener said there are over fifty kinds of trees in the gardens. Sycamore,Hornbeam,Hawthorn,Silver Leaf,Silver Birch,Ash,Beech,Weeping Willow,Oak,Flowering Cherry,Red Sycamore,Black Locust,Orange Blossom, Wild Rose,and Laburnum are amongst the varieties. Flowers which are found in the gardens include,roses,marigold,white allysum, geranium,fern,and rhododendron. There is an impressive war memorial and gateway at the main entrance.
